CustomField.description: Check this box if the target is for Sales Engineer, so we can exclude it from the total Sales Target. The Sales target for Sales Engineers is a subset for the total sales target for Enterprise and needs to be excluded in Performance reports.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if the target is for Sales Engineer, so we can exclude it from the total Sales Target. The Sales target for Sales Engineers is a subset for the total sales target for Enterprise and needs to be excluded in Performance reports.
CustomField.label: Sales Engineer Target
